content.query:
-- perform join on family family membership and family
SELECT 
    i.*, fm.*, f.*
FROM silver.vw_individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.vw_family_membership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.vw_family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family);



-- count items you have joined 
SELECT 
    COUNT(1) AS totals
FROM silver.vw_individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.vw_family_membership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.vw_family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family);


-- count how many individuals/family were assigned a primart contact
SELECT
    f.primary_contact,
    COUNT(1) AS totals
FROM silver.vw_individual i
JOIN silver.vw_family_membership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
JOIN silver.vw_family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
GROUP BY f.primary_contact
ORDER BY totals DESC;
